column1: Your tubes were either cauterized (burned shut) or clamped off with a small clip, a ring, or rubber bands.

As long as they are not severe, these symptoms are normal: - Shoulder pain - Scratchy or sore throat - Swollen belly (bloated) and crampy - Some discharge or bleeding from your vagina You should be able to do most of your normal activities after 2 or 3 days.
Change your dressings (bandages) as your health care provider told you to.
